entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of hail. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
